news.title: Divided Fed approves third rate cut this year, sees slower pace ahead
news.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday made its final final interest rate move of the year.

news.title: The Fed is the most divided it's been in more than a decade
news.description: Three members of the Federal Open Market Committee didn't agree with the central bank's quarter percentage point cut on Wednesday.

news.title: Dow jumps 380 points after Fed rate cut as traders bet more easing is coming next year: Live updates
news.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average continued to rise on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve's latest interest rate decision.

news.title: U.S. seizes oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela: Report
news.description: The White House has undertaken a large military buildup in the Caribbean and launched deadly strikes against boats that it claims were trafficking drugs.

news.title: Homeland Security Dept. buying Boeing 737s for ICE deportations
news.description: The Trump administration has aimed to deport 1 million immigrants from the United States in President Donald Trump's first year back in the White House.

news.title: What Wall Street analysts expect from Oracle earnings due after Wednesday's close
news.description: JPMorgan, which has a neutral rating on Oracle, believes management may provide a diversified list of reputable customers that could ease pressure on the stock.

news.title: Swiss government says new 15% U.S. tariff ceiling retroactive to mid-November
news.description: Switzerland agreed to reduce tariffs on imports from the United States of fish, seafood, and some agricultural products under a trade deal announced last month.

news.title: U.S. to mandate checks of some tourists' social media history from past 5 years
news.description: Tourists from countries including Britain, Japan, France, and Australia will now be expected to provide their social media history to visit to the U.S.

news.title: Trump admin touts pulling nearly 10,000 truckers off road for failing English tests
news.description: The Trump administration has drawn links between the surge in immigration under former President Joe Biden and road safety.

news.title: Here's what changed in the new Fed statement
news.description: This is a comparison of Wednesday's Federal Open Market Committee statement with the one issued after the Fed's previous policymaking meeting in October.

news.title: Southwest CEO says airline 'actively pursuing' network of airport lounges
news.description: Southwest's CEO said the carrier is weighing a network of airport lounges

news.title: Bessent says U.S. will finish the year with 3% GDP growth, sees 'very strong' holiday season
news.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the economy will end the year on strong footing and said the president was disappointed in economic coverage in the media.

news.title: Core inflation rate watched by Fed hit 2.8%, delayed September data shows, lower than expected
news.description: The delayed core personal consumption expenditures price index for September was expected to show a 2.9% annual increase.

news.title: Layoff announcements top 1.1 million this year, the most since 2020 pandemic, Challenger says
news.description: The firm said layoff plans totaled  71,321 in November, a step down from October but still enough to bring the 2025 total up to 1.17 million.

news.title: Ukraine, trade, pandas: What China's Xi and France's Macron discussed in Beijing
news.description: China said it is open to importing more high-quality goods from France while urging a "fair, conducive environment" for Chinese businesses in the European nation.

news.title: Bessent says Trump admin will be able to replicate tariffs even if it loses Supreme Court decision
news.description: The Treasury secretary cited several sections of 1962 Trade Act that give the president sweeping powers over import duties.

news.title: November private payrolls unexpectedly fell by 32,000, led by steep small business job cuts, ADP reports
news.description: The payrolls decline marked a sharp step down from October, which saw an upwardly revised gain of 47,000 positions.

news.title: Oracle set to report quarterly results after the bell
news.description: Oracle's hefty infrastructure costs and rising debt load have weighed on the stock in the past few months.

news.title: Nvidia responds to report that China's DeepSeek is using its banned Blackwell AI chips
news.description: The U.S. has blocked the export of Nvidia's Blackwell chips to China in an effort to stay ahead in the AI race.

news.title: ‘Greetings, earthlings’: Nvidia-backed Starcloud trains first AI model in space as orbital data center race heats up
news.description: The company's Starcloud-1 satellite is running Gemma, an open model from Google, marking the first time in history that an LLM has been trained in outer space.

news.title: Former GitLab CEO raises money for Kilo to compete in crowded AI coding market
news.description: Kilo Code, which makes a vibe coding extension, was founded by former GitLab CEO Sid Sijbrandij.

news.title: The Fed meeting, pressure on Oracle, Target's fashion-forward renovation and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Australia is trying to enforce the first teen social media ban. Governments worldwide are watching.
news.description: Australia has enacted the world's first ban on social media usage for users under the age of 16, in a move expected to be monitored by global lawmakers.

news.title: Trump says he 'heard' Biden Fed appointments were signed by autopen, tells aide to investigate
news.description: Trump's autopen comments came during a speech in Pennsylvania about the economy, aimed at countering Democrats' messaging about the U.S. affordability crisis.

news.title: Watch: Trump delivers speech on the economy in Pennsylvania as cost concerns grow
news.description: The Pennsylvania trip marks a return to the sort of voter outreach that defined Trump's political campaigns, but has grown rarer during his second term so far.

news.title: Trump trade rep changes China soybean purchase timeline, cites 'discrepancy'
news.description: China for months earlier this year had boycotted purchasing soybeans from U.S. farms because of a trade war began by President Donald Trump.
